reviews.text: Lovely little train station just a shame it’s not manned all the time to ask for help
Nice little country station good for getting on the train if you want to skip a bit of the cycle path. However Trains are often late and infrequent
This station is not manned and it has not been possible for me to get any assistance with a minor query. The pay box is open minimum hours. In future I shall be travelling to Bristol to get my train.
I find it frustrating that I cannot obtain my tickets, that I pre-booked, from the new ticket machine.

No ticket machine. I ordered my tickets online then have to drive to another station to collect them. I've got on the train into Bristol before and had no ticket master come along so then had to queue for ages at temple meads to buy the ticket I should have been able to get on the platform or the train which then made me late for my appointment. Well...later....in typical fashion, the train was late. Despite getting a train earlier than the one that would have got me there on time I was still late
